I use the words ‘villain’ and ‘good guys’ loosely here\, no-one is a hero or villain in the last of us world\, Joel did some terrible things\, as has Ellie and so has Abby. There is one part in the game where you have to play as the villain and fight the ‘good guy’ who you have grown to love over the past two games.
